title: S2 Ep11: The Possession of Mark David Chapman - Hr.1
itunes:title: The Possession of Mark David Chapman - Hr.1
description:
Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey appears on this episode of Darkness Radio to talk about an article he wrote about "Maria Simpson", a woman who befriended and rented to Mark David Chapman, the man who killed Beatle, John Lennon.  

"Maria" claims Chapman acted odd and recounts that behavior in this episode of Darkness Radio, even claiming he was possessed before that fateful day in New York City...
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
